Class GameViewModel

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.GameViewModel
public final class GameViewModel extends Object
Handles data-to-UI transformations for game rendering. Extracted from GuiController following Single Responsibility Principle - separates rendering logic from input handling and timing.

    • positionBrickPanel

      public void positionBrickPanel(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane brickPanel, ViewData brick)
      Positions the brick panel based on the current brick's position.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - the main game panel
      brickPanel - the brick panel to position
      brick - the view data containing brick position

    • updateBrickRectangles

      public void updateBrickRectangles(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] rectangles, ViewData brick)
      Updates the brick rectangles with colors from the view data.
      Parameters:
      rectangles - the rectangle array to update
      brick - the view data containing brick shape and colors

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix, int[][] board)
      Updates the board display matrix with the current board state.
      Parameters:
      displayMatrix - the rectangle array representing the board display
      board - the board state matrix
